m_szDocTitle: Jon Favreau & Rick Rubin Checking Out Elon Musk's Tesla Model X | CleanTechnica
m_szDocSumamry: Originally published on EV Obsession . Still haven’t seen enough pictures of the Tesla Model X yet? Yeah, me neither. So, to satisfy that apparent addiction, here are some new pictures of the high-tech, all-electric SUV. In particular, it is Tesla CEO Elon Musk’s Model X, and the pics include widely respected music producer Rick Rubin (the bearded guy) and movie director Jon Favreau (Elon’s buddy) admiring it as well.
